description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Planet Wars is an exciting old-school top down alien shooter. Play through the story-driven campaign with up to 4 players to earn credits, which you can spend on upgrading and customising your weapons & items, choosing from 70 different parts! There is also a Survival/Horde mode!
